description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user-supplied input to construct file paths without proper validation or sanitization, allowing an attacker to read arbitrary files. It is also vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) as it uses user-supplied input in SQL queries without proper sanitization, allowing an attacker to manipulate SQL queries. Lastly, it is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (CWE-79) as it uses user-supplied input in HTML output without proper sanitization, allowing an attacker to inject malicious scripts.
